longDescription.value: Snack Popcorn Chicken® is the ultimate KFC snack. Grab bite-sized, golden pieces of real breast fillet chicken, tumbled in our iconic herbs and spices. Cooked to perfection, they’re just for you. Snack on.

content.longDescription: Bite size pieces of real breast fillet chicken tumbled in our signature marinade and cooked in a crunchy coating.
